en-US.name: Care Assistant
en-US.summary: AI-powered call bell and intercom system for care homes using Python backend
en-US.description: The Care Assistant skill provides an AI-powered call bell and intercom system for residential care homes. Built with Python 3.9+ backend on AWS Lambda, it supports touch interactions on Echo Show devices, emergency help requests, and nurse communication. The system handles up to 10 rooms with 1-3 caregivers and includes advanced features like auto-retry logic and multi-device messaging.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: This skill is designed for use in care homes with Echo Show devices. Test with touch interactions and voice commands. Backend is implemented in Python 3.9+ with AWS Lambda.
